implementation_notes: Update docs/SPEC-KIT-045-mini/plan.md using Spec Kit skeleton; include 2025-10-14 evidence filenames: spec-plan_2025-10-14T15:58:30Z-79323873.{json,log} and baseline_2025-10-14T15:58:30Z-79323873.md.

Add rerun blocks: /cmd spec-ops-plan SPEC-KIT-045-mini and /cmd spec-ops-validate SPEC-KIT-045-mini --hal mock. Mention SPEC_OPS_CARGO_MANIFEST=codex-rs/Cargo.toml and SPEC_OPS_ALLOW_DIRTY=1 as needed.
Explicitly state remediation for any 2025-10-13 references in plan.md/tasks.md; mark older roster telemetry as historical.
Consensus & Risks section must call out degraded agent availability handling and model metadata capture.
Do not include secrets; HAL mock rationale should appear in acceptance mapping and docs narrative.

diff_suggestions.summary: Refresh telemetry to 2025-10-14T15:58:30Z-79323873, add rerun instructions, consensus section, and acceptance mapping aligned to schema v1.
Replace lingering 2025-10-13 evidence references with 2025-10-14; optional now or defer to /tasks stage with a tracked note.

risks: If plan.md keeps 2025-10-13 evidence, acceptance checks will point to stale artifacts.
Missing HAL mock rationale in validate-stage telemetry can cause schema v1 checks to fail.
Workspace splits may break cargo calls unless SPEC_OPS_CARGO_MANIFEST is set.
